attributes.action: pay for his own Sky t.v. just as the rest of us have to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It may be within the rules of parliament,but why should we pay for his and his cronies household bills?A second home may be necessary and have to be paid for,but the rest of their expenses is downright theft from the public purse.I would like to see these expenses stopped.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
